titles.title: National Museum of the American People Presidential Commission Establishment Act of 2020
National Museum of the American People Presidential Commission Establishment Act of 2020

A bill to establish a bipartisan Presidential Commission to study the establishment of a National Museum of the American People to tell the story about the making of the American People, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
National Museum of the American People Presidential Commission Establishment Act of 2020
This bill directs the President to establish a bipartisan commission to study the establishment of a National Museum of the American People.
